title: Where do you go from here
creator_credit: Rank Audio Visual, Ian Latimer and Jeff Inman
brief_description: Intended for use by companies that have formal management development programmes, as well as by those which use less sophisticated methods, this film helps managers develop skills necessary to making truly effective appraisal or performance improvement interviews. A skilfully handled interview is presented for in-depth study.
